Dialogue.Page: Whoa there! Easy around the fire, hatchling.
Ground control didn’t tell me you were launching. Long time no see!
Actually. I guess it’s been a long time since I’ve seen anyone.
Whoa there! Easy around the fire, hatchling.
Hey! Nice find, hatchling. Did you pick that up from somewhere around here?
My… that really is a beaut. Hornfels'll want that for sure!

DialogueOption.Text: Duuuuuuude… what is up with your head?

Dialogue.Page: Hoo boy… alright, hatchling. Easy now, take some long, deep breaths.
You're tripping on expired marshmallows right now, and let me tell you from experience: if you think sap wine is bad, you're in for a nightmare.
Potentially even literally. This is going to be a bad, long high for you. I'd recommend lying down on the ground with an empty bucket at the ready.
If you start seeing weird things or hearing voices do not engage. At some point it's going to feel like there are bugs on you but I promise there aren't actually any bugs.
Are you getting all this? Hearth to hatchling? Oh boy… welp, this is gonna be a learning experience. Good luck.
Whoa! Did you grab that from my stash?
Eugh, I don't know how you managed to stomach that, hatchling. Bad mallows are nothing to joke about.
It's good to see you, though. Been a long time since I've seen anyone.
Whoa! Did you grab that from my stash?
Eugh, I don't know how you managed to stomach that, hatchling. Bad mallows are nothing to joke about.
…Hmm.
Something's not right about the sun. I've never seen it get so red.
Oh! Hello there, hatchling. Ground control didn’t tell me you were launching. Long time no see!
Actually. I guess it’s been a long time since I’ve seen anyone.
…Hmm.
Something's not right about the sun. I've never seen it get so red.
Ah! Aww, hatchling, it's been too long since I've gotten a nice hug.
…Way too long, actually.
Chert! Hatchling! Goodness, I wasn't expecting either of you!
Now why are you holding my friend Chert like that, huh? They're not a kid, they're just small!
Chert: I'm actually getting used to it. In any case, it's wonderful to see you, Esker!
Likewise! Now, hatchling, you're on your first solo voyage, aren't you? Well, I suppose not 'solo' anymore, but still! Glad to see you're in once piece.
…Agh! What?! What's going on?!
…Dear Hearth, it's… it's beautiful…
Oh geez, really? That's some tough luck, hatchling. I'm not sure what to do for you here.
Thing is, I don't have a ship. I could radio down to home base or one of the travelers, but, well… they ignore me most of the time.
Oh, I've got an idea! Fly down there in your jetpack. Nice and easy and the landing shouldn't break anything more than a few feet bones.
Whoa there!
That was… quite the landing. For a second I thought that must've been Feldspar, but it's you, huh?
Geez, well. Your ship's completely broken. That's some tough luck, hatchling. I'm not sure what to do for you here.
Thing is, I don't have a ship. I could radio down to home base or one of the travelers, but, well… they ignore me most of the time.
Oh, I've got an idea! Fly down there in your jetpack. Nice and easy and the landing shouldn't break anything more than a few feet bones.
